p:
Determination of MBC. The MBC of EOs was determined based on Duarte et al.
18 with modifications ( Table 3). The MBCs of four EOs were in the range of 0.64 - 40.96 mg mL -1. The ZEO showed strong antibacterial ‎ ‎‎activities at MBC ≤ 1.28 mg mL -1. There were no differences between the antibacterial ‎ ‎‎activity of ZEO and OEO ( p ≥ 0.05). The most bactericidal effect of ZEO was observed against E. coli O157:H7 and S. putrefaciens. The lowest bactericidal efficacy of EOs was observed in CEO.
